page.title: 20PEBMARSH TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: Traffic was documented on a weekly basis and was never heavy. The heaviest day for{cars}was on Thursday which is a market day in Sudbury. Other light traffic was noted passing Pebmarsh School such as motorbikes,farm vehicles and lorries from the local grain store at King's Farm.These heavy lorries have been asked not to come through Pebmarsh. Some children are brought to school by a Sudbury taxi/minibus firm.20 children use the minibuses and 6 children use the taxi. The busiest times on the road through Pebmarsh are between 7a.m. and 8.30a.m.,and between 5p.m.and6.30p.m. ************************************* All information in this project was collected by children and staff of Pebmarsh Primary School.
